bioconda.name: skewer
bioconda.summary: A fast and accurate adapter trimmer for paired-end reads.

biocontainers.name: skewer
biocontainers.summary: A fast and accurate adapter trimmer for paired-end reads.

biotools.summary: Skewer implements a novel dynamic programming algorithm dedicated to the task of adapter trimming and it is specially designed for processing illumina paired-end sequences.

bioschemas.name: Skewer
bioschemas.summary: Skewer implements a novel dynamic programming algorithm dedicated to the task of adapter trimming and it is specially designed for processing illumina paired-end sequences.
